title: India's Own AI Revolution: Atomesus AI Set to Launch Soon
description: New Delhi [India], November 5: In a historic step for India's growing artificial-intelligence ecosystem, Atomesus AI, developed under the leadership of Indus Valley Group, is gearing up for its official launch. The initiative, led by a group of passionate college innovators with research exposure to ISRO-linked projects, aims to make artificial intelligence accessible, affordable, and proudly Indian.

title: IBM to cut thousands of jobs as it doubles down on AI, software and cloud growth push
description: IBM will reduce a small percentage of its global workforce in the fourth quarter, part of a broader strategic shift toward expanding its AI, software, and cloud offerings. The move reflects ongoing changes in the tech industry, with other major companies like Amazon and Microsoft also enacting layoffs. IBM employs approximately 270,000 people worldwide, and a 1% reduction could mean nearly 2,700 job losses. The company expects U.S. employment to remain flat year over year despite some domestic roles being impacted. These changes come as IBM reports stronger software revenue and adapts to advances in artificial intelligence.
content: IBM is preparing to lay off thousands of employees worldwide in the fourth quarter of 2025, as the company is focusing on sharpening its focus on artificial intelligence, software, and cloud services. The decision reportedly comes amid a wave of tech... [2615 chars]

title: Nvidia, Deutsche Telekom to build 1 billion euro AI cloud centre
description: Nvidia and Deutsche Telekom said Tuesday a one-billion-euro ($1.1 billion) industrial artificial intelligence hub will soon be launched in Germany, Europe’s latest bid to catch up in the global AI race.
content:
U.S. tech giant Nvidia and Deutsche Telekom said Tuesday a one-billion-euro ($1.1 billion) industrial artificial intelligence hub will soon be launched in Germany, Europe’s latest bid to catch up in the global AI race.

title: Amazon Demands Perplexity Stop AI Tool From Making Purchases
description: Amazon.com Inc. has sent a cease-and-desist letter to Perplexity AI Inc. demanding that the artificial intelligence search startup stop allowing its AI browser agent, Comet, to make purchases online for users.
content:

title: AI literacy deficit threatens digital readiness in schools
description: AI literacy is now fundamental to preparing future citizens and professionals. The study brings together global AI literacy research from 2015 to 2025, drawing on the Web of Science database to identify leading themes, countries, and intellectual networks shaping the field. Using advanced bibliometric tools, they trace how the discourse has shifted from general discussions of artificial intelligence to concrete pedagogical frameworks for teaching AI concepts.
content:
Despite AI’s rapid integration into classrooms, major gaps persist in how students and teachers understand, apply, and critically assess the technology, according to a new study published in Education Sciences.
The study, “Toward a Coherent AI Litera... [5194 chars]

title: AI to ‘unlock $370bn’ a year in additional bank profits
description: Boston Consulting Group says artificial intelligence can offset tightening margins and rising costs
content:
Retail banks could unlock hundreds of million of dollars a year in additional profits through large-scale deployment of artificial intelligence, says Boston Consulting Group.

title: AI misalignment could derail next-generation drug discovery
description: Artificial intelligence has already become indispensable in drug development. Machine learning algorithms now drive target identification, compound screening, and toxicity prediction. However, the author points out that true progress lies in creating AI systems that think in harmony with human intent, rather than optimizing only for technical performance or data patterns.
content: A new study published in Frontiers in Artificial Intelligence warns that the next frontier in drug discovery will depend not on speed or scale, but on alignment of artificial intelligence. Titled “AI Alignment Is All You Need for Future Drug Discover... [5424 chars]
